stripe.title: Stripe Payments
stripe.details: Enable Stripe to allow Clara AI to process payments, create checkout sessions, and manage subscriptions directly through conversations.
stripe.note: You'll need to create a Stripe account and add your API keys in Lovable secrets management.

stripeConfig.title: Stripe Configuration
stripeConfig.description: Configure your Stripe API keys and webhook
stripeConfig.webhookEndpointHelp: Copy this URL and add it as a webhook endpoint in your Stripe Dashboard → Developers → Webhooks
stripeConfig.secretKeyHelp: Found in Stripe Dashboard → Developers → API keys (starts with sk_live_ or sk_test_)
stripeConfig.webhookSecretHelp: Generated when you create the webhook endpoint in Stripe (starts with whsec_)
stripeConfig.comingSoon: Configuration will be saved to secure secrets storage (coming soon)
stripeConfig.step1: Create a Stripe account at stripe.com
stripeConfig.step2: Copy your API keys from the Stripe Dashboard
stripeConfig.step3: Add STRIPE_SECRET_KEY to your Lovable project secrets
stripeConfig.step4: Configure the webhook endpoint in Stripe with the URL above

settings.systemPromptDescription: Define how this agent behaves and responds
settings.systemPromptHelp: This is the core instruction that defines the agent's personality, knowledge, and behavior.
settings.personalityDescription: Fine-tune the agent's behavior and responses
settings.fileSizeError: File size must be less than 2MB
settings.fileFormatError: Only JPG, PNG, and WebP formats are allowed

clara.title: Clara Configuration
clara.subtitle: Customer Service AI Assistant
clara.settingsDescription: Clara handles customer inquiries, pricing questions, and guides visitors through the purchase process on the public website.

claraMember.title: Clara (Member) Configuration
claraMember.subtitle: Personal Companion AI for Members
claraMember.settingsDescription: Clara (Member) provides daily check-ins, wellness support, and medication reminders. Medical questions are automatically handed off to Ineke for clinical review.

claraFamily.title: Clara (Family) Configuration
claraFamily.subtitle: Support AI for Family Carers
claraFamily.settingsDescription: Clara (Family) helps family carers understand their loved one's care, explains health metrics, and provides reassurance. Clinical concerns are handed off to Ineke for professional guidance.

ineke.title: Ineke Configuration
ineke.subtitle: Nurse Support AI Assistant
ineke.settingsDescription: Ineke has access to member data, health metrics, tasks, and alerts within the nurse dashboard. All access is logged and restricted to assigned members only.

isabella.title: Isabella Configuration
isabella.subtitle: Facility Management AI Assistant
isabella.settingsDescription: Isabella assists facility and company administrators with staff management, resident oversight, compliance reporting, and operational efficiency. Available to facility_admin, company_admin, and insurance_admin roles.

lee.title: Lee "The Brain" Configuration
lee.subtitle: Master AI Orchestrator
lee.settingsDescription: Lee "The Brain" is the master AI orchestrator with full system access. Lee can query all other agents, access system analytics, and provide executive-level insights. Restricted to admin users only.
lee.warning: ⚠️ Lee has elevated permissions and can access all data across the platform. Configure with care and ensure proper audit logging is enabled.
